catentdesc.name: Klaus Silver Towel Rack

catentdesc.name: Colts Towel Rack with Shelf
catentdesc.shortdescription: A space-saving towel bar and shelf.
catentdesc.longdescription: Space is at a premium with this fashionable nickel mounted towel rack. An organizers dream, the towel rack adds elegance to any bathroom. A shelf on the top of the towel bar gives room for extra towels or ornaments to be displayed.
